StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc979
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProcName sysname = NULL AS
--- DECLARE @ProcName as varchar(100) DECLARE @SQLString varchar(100)
--- IF NO PROCEDURE NAME IS PASSED IN, LOOP THROUGH AND GRANT EXECUTE PERMISSIONS ON ALL --- STORED PROCEDURES AND USER-DEFINED FUNCTIONS IF @ProcName IS NULL BEGIN DECLARE sproc_Cursor CURSOR FOR SELECT NAME FROM SYSOBJECTS WHERE (NAME LIKE 'SP%' AND XTYPE = 'P') OR XTYPE = 'FN'
OPEN sproc_Cursor
FETCH NEXT FROM sproc_Cursor INTO @ProcName
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN --- SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[' + @ProcName + '] TO [MCRISS]' --- EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON ' + @ProcName + ' TO MCRISS' EXEC (@SQLString)
FETCH NEXT FROM sproc_Cursor INTO @ProcName END
CLOSE sproc_Cursor DEALLOCATE sproc_Cursor END ELSE BEGIN --- GRANT EXECUTE PERMISSION TO MCRISS ON THE PROCEDURE PASSED IN --- SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[' + @ProcName + '] TO [MCRISS]' SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON ' + @ProcName + ' TO MCRISS' EXEC (@SQLString) END
